about_the_game:
BOOM42 is a fun and engaging couch versus party game for groups of up to 8 players. The game aims to test the strength of friendships in a unique and nostalgic way. The charming retro aesthetic, 1BITish take, will transport players to an adventure like (never) before. Players will take on the role of the Crew-42 and embark on a journey of excitement and entertainment. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the scene, BOOM42 is easy to pick up and offers endless hours of fun for everyone.

Modern Retro Feel


Step back in time with a modern twist: Experience the nostalgia of the past, reimagined for the present.

Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping adventure as you and your friends battle it out on treacherous platforms, dodging laser beams and falling comets while collecting powerful power-ups to gain the upper hand. But be warned, this is not for the faint of heart - only the most cunning and agile will survive. Will you work together or will you be the last one standing? The choice is yours in this dangerous, high-stakes game for up to 8 players.

Giant Deep-Space Dapper Squad


The Universe is being threatened by a group of giant dapper creatures! They- Wait what? Giant dapper creatures? Who made that up?

I thought we were fighting each-other? No! Deep-Space is big and full of dangerous space creatures. Don't be fooled into thinking it's all doom and gloom - sometimes, you'll need to band together with your fellow players to survive. But watch out, as just one of your friends with a hunger for conflict could change everything in an instant.

Uncover new Game Modes!


Embark on an epic journey with the Crew! Discover new planets, encounter strange new life forms, and uncover hidden treasures. The universe is full of surprises, and with your crew by your side, you'll be ready for anything. Whether it's taking on thrilling challenges or coming across unexpected discoveries, you will have a blast. Are you ready to set off on an adventure like no other? Join the Crew-42 and discover what lies beyond the stars!

Developer Note

As of right now BOOM42 is still in early-development and aspects of the game will change as we go along, hop in the train now if you want to help and give ideas! Maybe even have your character in the game telling a god-awful dad joke!
